data.name: ConfManNoModDataFolder
data.value: Arrr! This map be lackin' a name for its data folder. To access the Treasure Map Keeper, ye need to edit this map and set a name for the data folder.

data.name: ConfManInvalidDataFolder
data.value: The treasure chest ye set for this map be nowhere in sight. Make sure ye have the right name for the data folder set.

data.name: ConfManDragDrop
data.value: Click here to unfurl the map or drop yer map to add to the ship.

data.name: EditModLaunchArgsNotice
data.value: This don't be applyin' to maps stowed within the hull

data.name: EditModDefaultLocationNotice
data.value: Maps will be stashed in their default location, which ye can adjust in settings

data.name: EditModExternalSourceNotice
data.value: This map be from an external app or website. We advise ye to trust not from unworthy sources.

data.name: EditProfileDefaultLocationNotice
data.value: Ships will be docked to their home ports. The captain can assign the home port.

data.name: PrivEscText
data.value: Only the Cap'n has admin permissions to launch Jiayi.

data.name: PrivEscRestartNotice
data.value: Jiayi will restart after the Cap'n gives admin permissions.

data.name: PrivEscNotice
data.value: Jiayi was started with admin privileges, Captain.

data.name: ImportModQuestion
data.value: Would ye like to import this map collection?

data.name: ImportModDefaultLocationNotice
data.value: The maps in this collection will be stowed to their home ports.

data.name: ImportModMergeNotice
data.value: The maps in this collection will be merged with yer collection

data.name: NewModOfflineNotice
data.value: Ye cannae do this while docked.

data.name: NewModCreateCollectionQuestion
data.value: Ye haven't got a map collection rigged up. Be ye wantin' to set one up to stash these maps?

data.name: NewModNoCollectionTitle
data.value: Ye haven't got a map collection rigged up.

data.name: NewModAlreadyInCollection
data.value: This Map Be In Yer Collection, Cap'n!!

data.name: NewModInvalidLink
data.value: Aye, that link be as useful as a barnacle on a peg leg!

data.name: NewModLinkNotFound
data.value: Thar be no treasure buried at this address!

data.name: ThemePublishNoRawTags
data.value: Failed to Ready Flag (minimum 1 raw marking)

data.name: ThemePublishFinalize
data.value: "Yer Flag be stowed in the chest we just unlocked. To spy it here, open a pull request on our GitHub repository for flags (themes). Look to the README for guidance

data.name: AboutPresenting
data.value: Arr, after several years of stormy seas and fierce battles, we proudly unveil:

data.name: VerManResizeTip
data.value: Ye can resize Jiayi to see the full list on the right

data.name: VerManShaderManagerText
data.value: Easily apply RenderDragon shaders to yer ship. Works best if ye have the ship installed through Jiayi.

data.name: VerManShaderManagerVerTooLow
data.value: Yer ship version does not have RenderDragon. Use a resource pack fer shaders instead.

data.name: VerManShaderManagerMSStore
data.value: Yer ship is installed through the Microsoft Store. Jiayi cannot apply shaders to it.

data.name: InstallLocNotInstalled
data.value: Ye don't have the ship installed

data.name: VerListRemoveConfirm
data.value: Are ye sure ye want to remove this version?

data.name: VerListDevModeQuestion
data.value: Ye need to enable developer mode to switch versions. Do ye want to enable it now?

data.name: VerListNotFound
data.value: This version has not been stowed yet.

data.name: VerListBackupFailed
data.value:
Jiayi couldn't stash away yer ship plunder afore the switch in versions. This may be 'cause access to the ship data chest was denied.
More details be awaitin' ye in yer scroll scroll.

data.name: VerListUnknownError
data.value: Arr, an unknown tempest brewed while switchin' versions. Check yer scroll scroll for more clues on this mysterious occurrence.

data.name: VerListInvalidPackage
data.value: GARR! That's not a valid package.

data.name: DashboardNoMod
data.value: Grab a map to see it here!

data.name: ModsMenuDragDrop
data.value: Drag maps, cargo, or port addresses here or click the plus button to add maps

data.name: ModsMenuNoModsFolder
data.value:
Ye dun have a maps collection prepared!
Drag a folder here to make it work with Jiayi, or add maps to create a new collection!

data.name: ModsMenuCreateFolderQuestion
data.value: Aye, Jiayi can carve out a maps chest for ye to stash yer loot. Set sail for the documents folder, me hearties!

data.name: ProfilesMenuBrokenProfile
data.value: This Ship is broken; the port containing its ship data is missing or empty.

data.name: ProfilesMenuApplyProfileConfirm
data.value: Are ye set to launch this ship, Cap'n? We will lose other ships launched.

data.name: ProfilesMenuAboutProfiles
data.value: Arrr, craftin' a new vessel will be makin' a duplicate o' yer current ship data, savvy? That includes yer worlds, resource packs, 'n settings, matey!

data.name: ProfilesMenuDeleteProfileConfirm
data.value: Be ye sure ye be wantin' to scuttle this Ship. There be no turnin' back, mate...

data.name: SettingsConfirmEnable
data.value: Be ye sure ye be wantin' to hoist this flag?

data.name: SettingsConfirmAction
data.value: Arrr, there be no turnin' back!

data.name: SettingsInvalidSettingsText
data.value: Yer scroll is illegible, and as useless as a ship without a mast!!!

data.name: SettingsInvalidSettingsText2
data.value: Yer previous scroll has been replaced with yer new scroll.

data.name: SettingsModCollectionPathDesc
data.value: The location of the chest containing yer maps.

data.name: SettingsExportCollection
data.value: Ship yer maps to another port

data.name: SettingsExportCollectionDesc
data.value: Write yer map collection to a scroll. ye can share this scroll with yer crew!

data.name: SettingsProfileCollectionPathDesc
data.value: The location of the port containing yer ships.

data.name: SettingsVersionsPathDesc
data.value: The path to the location containing yer ship installs.

data.name: SettingsUpdateVersionListDesc
data.value: Update the list of available versions.

data.name: SettingsShadersPathDesc
data.value: The location to the chest containing yer shaders.

data.name: SettingsPrimaryBackgroundColorDesc
data.value: The primary background color of yer ship.

data.name: SettingsSecondaryBackgroundColorDesc
data.value: The secondary background color of yer ship.

data.name: SettingsAccentColorDesc
data.value: The accent color of yer ship.

data.name: SettingsTextColorDesc
data.value: The color of text seen throughout the ship.

data.name: SettingsAccentTextColorDesc
data.value: The color of text on top of the accent color.

data.name: SettingsGrayTextColorDesc
data.value: A gray version of the text color.

data.name: SettingsShadowDistanceDesc
data.value: The distance of the shadows on UI elements.

data.name: SettingsMovementSpeedDesc
data.value: The speed at which the UI moves.

data.name: SettingsUseBackgroundImageDesc
data.value: Use an image as the background of yer ship.

data.name: SettingsSelectBackgroundDesc
data.value: Select a background image from yer computer.

data.name: SettingsGeneratePaletteDesc
data.value: Create a color palette based on yer background image. Videos are NOT supported.

data.name: SettingsGeneratePaletteTooltip
data.value: Palette generation is memory intensive and may take a while. Every generated palette is slightly different.

data.name: SettingsBackgroundBlurDesc
data.value: How much to blur the background by.

data.name: SettingsBackgroundBrightnessDesc
data.value: How bright the background should be.

data.name: SettingsRoundingDesc
data.value: How much to round the corners of most UI elements.

data.name: SettingsBorderColorDesc
data.value: The color of the borders on UI elements.

data.name: SettingsAccentBorderColorDesc
data.value: The color of the borders around the accent color.

data.name: SettingsBorderThicknessDesc
data.value: The thickness of borders on UI elements.

data.name: SettingsOpenThemeDesc
data.value: Reveal yer theme in File Explorer. ye can share this with other people or use other people's themes.

data.name: SettingsRestoreDefaultThemeDesc
data.value: Go back to Jiayi's default theme.

data.name: SettingsThemesMenuDesc
data.value: Local and downloadable themes created by the community.

data.name: SettingsRichPresenceDesc
data.value: Show what yer doing in Jiayi on Discord.

data.name: SettingsRichPresenceTooltip
data.value:
Available formatting strings for rich presence:
%mod_name% - the name of the map ye use %game_version% - yer current Minecraft version %mod_count% - how many maps ye have in yer collection %shader_name% - the name of the shader yer using %profile_count% - how many ships ye have in yer collection %launcher_version% - the version of Jiayi yer using
Only 1 formatting string can be used per field.

data.name: SettingsDiscordShowElapsedTimeDesc
data.value: Show how long ye had Jiayi open for.

data.name: SettingsDiscordShowDownloadButtonDesc
data.value: Show a button to download Jiayi on Discord.

data.name: SettingsDiscordShareCurrentModDesc
data.value: Show a button for other users to add the map yer playing with. This only works with web maps.

data.name: SettingsLargeImageKeyDesc
data.value: The large image key to use for rich presence.

data.name: SettingsSmallImageKeyDesc
data.value: The small image key to use for rich presence.

data.name: SettingsLargeImageTextDesc
data.value: The text to display when hovering over the large image.

data.name: SettingsSmallImageTextDesc
data.value: The text to display when hovering over the small image.

data.name: SettingsEnableUpdaterDesc
data.value: Allow the launcher to check for and download updates.

data.name: SettingsAutoDownloadUpdatesDesc
data.value: Always download updates when they're available.

data.name: SettingsOfflineModeDesc
data.value: Disable access to the internet. Some features may not work. Restart Jiayi for this to take full effect.

data.name: SettingsOfflineModeTooltip
data.value: Features like remote maps, downloading versions, and checking for updates will not work.

data.name: SettingsFollowRedirectsDesc
data.value: Follow redirects when adding web maps. Change this setting if ye have trouble adding some maps.

data.name: SettingsUseInjectionDelayDesc
data.value: Wait for a set amount of time instead of waiting for the ship to load before injecting.

data.name: SettingsInjectionDelayDesc
data.value: The amount of time to wait before injecting, in seconds.

data.name: SettingsOverrideModuleRequirementDesc
data.value:
Override the amount of loaded modules needed before Jiayi will inject.
If the launcher injects too early or too late, try changing this value.

data.name: SettingsModuleRequirementDesc
data.value: The amount of loaded modules needed before Jiayi will inject.

data.name: SettingsAccelerateGameLoadingDesc
data.value: Speed up loading times by terminating unnecessary processes. Beware of jank.

data.name: SettingsAccelerateGameLoadingTooltip
data.value: May cause issues related to Microsoft Store licensing (determining whether ye own the ship or not).

data.name: SettingsMinimizeFixDesc
data.value: Prevents the ship from suspending itself when minimized. Changes are applied on launch.

data.name: SettingsAnonymizeLogsDesc
data.value: Hides any identifying information from scrolls. This does not apply retroactively.

data.name: SettingsOpenLogFolderDesc
data.value: Open the scroll folder in File Explorer.

data.name: ModCardInvalidLink
data.value: This map is broken; it doesn't exist in the seas anymore.

data.name: ModCardMissingFile
data.value: This map is broken; the file is missing from the maps directory.

data.name: ModCardOffline
data.value: Internet maps are disabled in offline mode

data.name: ModCardDeleteModConfirm
data.value: Are ye sure ye want to delete {0}? This action is irreversible.

data.name: ModCardLaunchMultipleModsConfirm
data.value: Launching more than one map at a time can make yer ship unstable. Are ye sure ye want to launch {0}?

data.name: ModCardDownloadFailed
data.value: Failed to download map. Please try again later.

data.name: ModCardModNotFound
data.value: Yer map was deleted during launch. Try turning off yer antivirus.

data.name: ModCardGameNotFound
data.value: The ship was scuttled during launch. Turn off yer antivirus in case it's terminating the ship.

data.name: ModCardVersionMismatch
data.value: {0} doesn't support yer current ship version. Would ye like to switch to {1}?

data.name: ModCardInjectionFailed
data.value: Yer map could not be injected. Try turning off yer antivirus, and check scrolls for extended error information.

data.name: ThemeCardOverwriteConfirm
data.value: Are ye sure ye want to overwrite this theme? All of yer local changes will be lost.

data.name: DontAskAgain
data.value: Avast, enough o' yer blabberin'! Belay that! Pipe down! By Davy Jones' locker, I said no! Avast, no more! No means nay! Suckle Upon A Bilge-Rat's Nethers! Belay that noise! Nevermore! Ye be naught but a sorry excuse for a pirate!

data.name: OfflineModeDesc
data.value: Ye're docked at port. Some features may not work.

data.name: UpdateInstalledDesc2
data.value: Ye can view the changelog on GitHub.

data.name: UpdateAvailableDesc
data.value: An update is available. Would ye like to download it?
